channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Trump Calls Being President A "Very Dangerous Profession"

media:content.media:description: On Friday, Trump described the presidency as riskier than some of the most perilous professions.

item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday reflected on threats to his life as he celebrated a court ruling that handed his administration sweeping power to pursue his policy agenda.
item.content:encoded: U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday reflected on threats to his life as he celebrated a court ruling that handed his administration sweeping power to pursue his policy agenda.

item.title: Trump Must Stop "Disrespectful" Tone Against Khamenei if He Wants Deal: Iran

media:content.media:description: Iranian Foreign Minister said that Trump stop hurting his millions of sincere supporters

item.description: Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi condemned Saturday the "disrespectful and unacceptable" comments from US President Donald Trump, who claimed to have saved Iran's supreme leader Ali Khamenei from an "ugly and ignominious death".
item.content:encoded: Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi condemned Saturday the "disrespectful and unacceptable" comments from US President Donald Trump, who claimed to have saved Iran's supreme leader Ali Khamenei from an "ugly and ignominious death".

item.title: Trump Says He Will Get Conflict Solved With North Korea

media:content.media:description: Trump and Kim held three summits during Trump's 2017-2021 first term.

item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said he will "get the conflict solved with North Korea."
item.content:encoded: U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said he will "get the conflict solved with North Korea."

item.title: Updates: Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sanchez Are Now Married

media:content.media:description: Bezos and Sanchez announced their engagement in 2023.

item.description: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and journalist Lauren Sanchez have arrived in Venice ahead of their wedding.
item.content:encoded: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and journalist Lauren Sanchez have arrived in Venice ahead of their wedding.

item.title: Jeff Bezos And Lauren Sanchez Are Now Married. See First Pic Of Newlyweds

media:content.media:description: Sanchez late Friday posted a photo on Instagram -- under a new name, laurensanchezbezos.

item.description: Amazon tycoon Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez tied the knot Friday at a sumptuous ceremony with the rich and famous on an island in Venice's lagoon, out of the sight and sound of protesters.
item.content:encoded: Amazon tycoon Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez tied the knot Friday at a sumptuous ceremony with the rich and famous on an island in Venice's lagoon, out of the sight and sound of protesters.

item.title: Trump Hopeful For Gaza Ceasefire, Possibly "Next Week"
item.description: President Donald Trump said on Friday he believes it is possible that a ceasefire in the Gaza conflict will be reached within a week.
item.content:encoded: President Donald Trump said on Friday he believes it is possible that a ceasefire in the Gaza conflict will be reached within a week.

item.title: "Killing Field": UN Says New Gaza Aid System Leads To Mass Killings

media:content.media:description: Gaza officials said that 65 Palestinians had been killed on Friday by Israeli strikes.

item.description: United Nations officials on Friday said a US- and Israeli-backed distribution system in Gaza was leading to mass killings of people seeking aid and urged Israel to let UN humanitarian supplies to the war-stricken territory resume.
item.content:encoded: United Nations officials on Friday said a US- and Israeli-backed distribution system in Gaza was leading to mass killings of people seeking aid and urged Israel to let UN humanitarian supplies to the war-stricken territory resume.

item.title: Trump Ends Trade Talks With Canada Over Tax On US Tech Firms

media:content.media:description: Trump said Canada will learn of their tariff rate within a week.

item.description: President Donald Trump said Friday that he is calling off trade negotiations with Canada in retaliation for taxes impacting major US tech firms, adding that Ottawa will learn of their tariff rate within a week.
item.content:encoded: President Donald Trump said Friday that he is calling off trade negotiations with Canada in retaliation for taxes impacting major US tech firms, adding that Ottawa will learn of their tariff rate within a week.

item.title: Putin Says Russia Plans To Cut Military Spending From Next Year

media:content.media:description: Putin said on Friday that Russia was looking to cut its military expenditure from next year

item.description: NATO allies on Wednesday agreed to raise their collective spending goal to 5% of gross domestic product in the next 10 years, citing what they called the long-term threat posed by Russia and the need to strengthen civil and military resilience.
item.content:encoded: NATO allies on Wednesday agreed to raise their collective spending goal to 5% of gross domestic product in the next 10 years, citing what they called the long-term threat posed by Russia and the need to strengthen civil and military resilience.

item.title: A Trump Political Dynasty? His Son Eric Says...
item.description: Donald Trump's second son fueled speculation that his family seeks to establish a multi-generational political dynasty, saying he and other relatives may run for public office.
item.content:encoded: Donald Trump's second son fueled speculation that his family seeks to establish a multi-generational political dynasty, saying he and other relatives may run for public office.

item.title: "Saved Him From Ugly, Ignominious Death": Trump On Iran's Khamenei

media:content.media:description: Donald Trump said he had saved Iran's Ayatollah Ali Khameni from assassination

item.description: The US president accused the Iranian leader of ingratitude after Khamenei said in a defiant message that reports of damage to its nuclear sites from US bombing were exaggerated, and said Iran had beaten Israel and dealt Washington a "slap."
item.content:encoded: The US president accused the Iranian leader of ingratitude after Khamenei said in a defiant message that reports of damage to its nuclear sites from US bombing were exaggerated, and said Iran had beaten Israel and dealt Washington a "slap."

item.title: Danish General Says He Is Not Losing Sleep Over US Plans For Greenland

media:content.media:description: US President Donald Trump has repeatedly suggested the United States might acquire Greenland

item.description: The head of Denmark's Arctic command said the prospect of a US takeover of Greenland was not keeping him up at night after talks with a senior US general last week but that more must be done to deter any Russian attack on the Arctic island.
item.content:encoded: The head of Denmark's Arctic command said the prospect of a US takeover of Greenland was not keeping him up at night after talks with a senior US general last week but that more must be done to deter any Russian attack on the Arctic island.

item.title: India Bans Imports Of Certain Jute, Other Items From Bangladesh Via Land

media:content.media:description: India banned imports of certain jute products and woven fabrics from Bangladesh via land

item.description: The goods under these curbs include jute products, flax tow and waste, jute and other bast fibres, jute, single flax yarn, single yarn of jute, multiple folded, woven fabrics or flex, and unbleached woven fabrics of jute.
item.content:encoded: The goods under these curbs include jute products, flax tow and waste, jute and other bast fibres, jute, single flax yarn, single yarn of jute, multiple folded, woven fabrics or flex, and unbleached woven fabrics of jute.

item.title: Trump Claims He Stopped India, Pak War By Threatening To 'Cancel All Deals'

media:content.media:description: Trump repeated his claims that he stopped the war between India and Pakistan

item.description: Trump again repeated his claim that he stopped the war between India and Pakistan, which he claimed could have turned nuclear, after he told the countries that Washington would not "trade" with Delhi and Islamabad.
item.content:encoded: Trump again repeated his claim that he stopped the war between India and Pakistan, which he claimed could have turned nuclear, after he told the countries that Washington would not "trade" with Delhi and Islamabad.

item.title: "Difficult Country": Trump Calls Off Trade Talks With Canada
item.description: US President Donald Trump said on Friday that he is calling off trade negotiations with Canada immediately, citing its digital services tax and adding that Ottawa will learn of their tariff rate within a week.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump said on Friday that he is calling off trade negotiations with Canada immediately, citing its digital services tax and adding that Ottawa will learn of their tariff rate within a week.

item.title: Our Oceans Are In Trouble: Here's How To Take Action Beyond The Outrage

media:content.media:description: The ocean is getting warmer, coral reefs are dying and sea levels are rising. (Representational)

item.description: Our oceans are in trouble. Catches from many of the world's fisheries are declining, with some fishing practices destroying enormous areas of the sea bed.
item.content:encoded: Our oceans are in trouble. Catches from many of the world's fisheries are declining, with some fishing practices destroying enormous areas of the sea bed.

item.title: "I Think We Are Going To Reach A Deal": Trump On Trade Deal With India

media:content.media:description: US President Donald Trump has expressed optimism about a trade deal with India

item.description: Earlier this month, while speaking at the US-India Strategic Partnership Forum, US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick said that a trade deal between India and the United States could be finalised soon.
item.content:encoded: Earlier this month, while speaking at the US-India Strategic Partnership Forum, US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick said that a trade deal between India and the United States could be finalised soon.

item.title: Wildfire Smoke Can Harm Your Brain, Not Just Your Lungs

media:content.media:description: Tiny airborne pollutants in smoke have been linked to risk of stroke, dementia, etc. (Representational)

item.description: Wildfires are already burning in parts of Canada, and as they do, many communities are already facing the familiar thick haze as smoke drifts in.
item.content:encoded: Wildfires are already burning in parts of Canada, and as they do, many communities are already facing the familiar thick haze as smoke drifts in.

item.title: 4,415 Indians Evacuated From Conflict Zones In Iran, Israel Via 19 Flights: Centre

media:content.media:description: The Government of India is deeply committed to the safety and well-being of its citizens abroad.

item.description: The Indian government has initiated Operation Sindhu to evacuate Indian nationals from conflict zones in Iran and Israel amid escalating tensions in West Asia. The operation, which began on June 18, has successfully evacuated over 4415 Indians.
item.content:encoded: The Indian government has initiated Operation Sindhu to evacuate Indian nationals from conflict zones in Iran and Israel amid escalating tensions in West Asia. The operation, which began on June 18, has successfully evacuated over 4415 Indians.

item.title: In Big Win For Trump, US Supreme Court Curbs Judges' Powers To Block His Orders
item.description: The US Supreme Court handed President Donald Trump a major victory by curbing the power of lone federal judges to block executive actions.
item.content:encoded: The US Supreme Court handed President Donald Trump a major victory by curbing the power of lone federal judges to block executive actions.
